content.text:
# Indian Historical Review

The Indian Historical Review is a peer-reviewed academic journal published bi-annually in association with the [http://ichr.ac.in/ Indian Council of Historical Research].
The journal is a member of the Committee on Publication Ethics (COPE). It is edited by Raghuvendra Tanwar
Abstracting and indexing
Indian Historical Review is abstracted and indexed in:
* Bibliography of Asian Studies (BAS)
* Clarivate Analytics: Arts & Humanities Citation Index (AHCI)
* DeepDyve
* Dutch-KB
* EBSCOIndian Citation Index (ICI)
* J-Gate
* OCLC
* Ohio
* Portico
* ProQuest: Social Science Premium Collection
* SCOPUS
* UGC-CARE (GROUP II)
References
* [http://publicationethics.org/members/= COPE]
* http://ichr.ac.in/journals.html
External links
*
* [http://www.sagepub.in/journals/Journal201961?siteId=sage-india&prodTypes=any&q=ihr&fs=1=Journal Homepage]
* [http://ichr.ac.in/v3/ Society]
